summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $35.00 out of the general fund of the City of Seattle, in settlement of the claim of Mrs. J. R. Riether for damages to house owned by said claimant located at 1340 Alki Avenue, Seattle, said damages being occasioned by the breaking of a sewer pipe which caused said premises on or about the 10th day of February 1916, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
